snippet: A colleague of Malcolm A. Smith, the New York state senator on trial on bribery charges, said Mr. Smith believed he was the victim of a “coup.”
abstract: New York State Sen Diane J Savino testifies in bribery and wire fraud trial of her colleague Malcolm A Smith, saying Smith felt 'marginalized' in the senate after he had lost his job as majority leader; Smith is accused of bribing White Plains Republican leaders to give him a letter that would authorize him to run as a Republican in New York City mayoral race.
lead_paragraph: A colleague of Malcolm A. Smith, the New York state senator on trial on bribery charges, said Mr. Smith believed he was the victim of a “coup.”
